thread.title: Nancy Watson

author: Nancy Watson
title: Nancy Watson
text: The employee I dealt with several times via email was extremely helpful, and the post-lumpectomy pad I ordered seems to be of good quality. However, I do think that there should be a couple of loops attached a few inches from each other along the "tail" that wraps halfway around my body so that a bra can slide through it and prevent the tail from hanging down my back and below the bottom edge of my shirt. It's entirely predictable that this would happen and I don't think it should be left to the customer to try to figure out a way to keep it in place.
